ygData.title: The UK FTM Network
ygData.description: The UK FTM network is an informal list, open to all UK based female to male (FTM)transgender and transsexual people, or those exploring this aspect of their gender. When requesting to join the group please understand that the recent increase in media attention of transsexuals we are having to be extra careful to protect the members so please give as much info as possible save emailing you for more delaying your request. If you know someone in the group mention their name will speed up joining There aren't many rules of membership, but to keep this a welcoming and supportive group, please remember the following points: When replying to a message, please remember to delete as much as possible of the original message, otherwise daily digests get very fragmented and long. - Avoid sending short "me too" or "thanks for that" type messages to the group. Send a private message to the individual instead of swamping the list. - Abusive, racist, sexist, homophobic or transphobic comments will not be tolerated. - Sexualised content, 'contact posts' and commercial advertising are not acceptable. - Please do not copy material from the group or reproduce any content without first seeking the authors permission. - Please seek approval from the moderators before posting any requests to the group asking its members to take part in any of the following: Media Project Or anything in the public domain We also ask that if you are selling items send a draft to the moderators. If in any doubt please email the moderators first. We need to protect members of the list and help them make informed decisions. Failure to keep to these rules will result in you being banned or moderated. *********************************************************************** Finally if you would like to submit an image or logo for our front page please see message : 32046 for more details.
ygData.name: FTM-UK
